title: Methylsulfonylmethane (MSM)
description: Chlorella-World introduces MSM crystal flakes - the most effective dietary supplement that helps to prevent osteoarthritis.
cleaned_text: It is a naturally occurring nutrient, a beneficial form of the mineral sulphur, found in nearly all living organisms, plant, animal and human, with the formula (CH3)2SO2. MSM is sold as a dietary supplement and is commonly used (often in combination with glucosamine and/or chondroitin) for helping to treat or prevent osteoarthritis.
